mapper.select: select a.id,a.group_id,a.subject_id,a.sort_no,a.creator,a.create_time,a.last_modifier,a.last_modify_time,a.del_flag,b.subject_code,b.subject_name,b.in_out_typecode,b.biz_typecode,b.fees_type from bms_group_subject a inner JOIN bms_subject_info b on a.subject_id=b.id where 1=1 and a.group_id=#{groupId} and ifnull(a.del_flag,'0')='0' and ifnull(b.del_flag,'0')='0'
select count(*) as num from bms_group_subject where group_id=#{groupId} and ifnull(del_flag,'0')='0'
